statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_usage_data;
SELECT merchant_name, amount FROM credit_card_usage_data WHERE category='Groceries';
SELECT credit_card_number, transaction_date FROM credit_card_usage_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) as average_amount FROM credit_card_usage_data GROUP BY category;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM credit_card_usage_data ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_usage_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT merchant_name, amount FROM credit_card_usage_data WHERE category = 'Groceries' AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT credit_card_number, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM credit_card_usage_data GROUP BY credit_card_number HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, category FROM credit_card_usage_data GROUP BY category HAVING avg_amount > 500 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM credit_card_usage_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY credit_card_number ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, card_number, transaction_date, merchant, amount FROM credit_card_data;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT cardholder_id, name, address, phone_number FROM cardholders;
SELECT name, SUM(amount) AS total_spend FROM credit_card_data GROUP BY name;
SELECT id, amount FROM credit_card_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, card_number, amount, merchant FROM credit_card_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM cardholders WHERE cardholder_id = 1
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM cardholders WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%'
SELECT * FROM credit_card_data WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT id, merchant, amount FROM credit_card_data WHERE merchant = 'Amazon'
SELECT * FROM CreditCards
SELECT card_holder_name, card_type FROM CreditCards
SELECT card_holder_name, spending_limit FROM CreditCards WHERE spending_limit > 5000
SELECT merchant_name, category FROM Merchants
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM CreditCards;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_type FROM CreditCards ORDER BY card_holder_name DESC;
SELECT card_holder_name, spending_limit FROM CreditCards WHERE spending_limit > 1000 ORDER BY spending_limit ASC;
SELECT m.merchant_name, t.transaction_amount FROM Merchants m INNER JOIN Transactions t ON m.merchant_id = t.transaction_id;

SELECT c.card_holder_name, t.transaction_amount, m.category FROM CreditCards c JOIN Transactions t ON c.card_number = t.card_number JOIN Merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.merchant_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY t.transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions
SELECT merchant_name, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100
SELECT cardholder_name, cardholder_email FROM cardholders
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_category, merchant_location FROM merchants
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT cardholder_name, cardholder_email, cardholder_phone_number FROM cardholders WHERE cardholder_address LIKE '%Lane%'
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_category FROM merchants ORDER BY merchant_name ASC
SELECT card_number, card_expiry_date FROM cards WHERE card_type = 'Credit'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit FROM credit_cards ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_score FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT card_number, transaction_amount, merchant FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY credit_limit ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit FROM credit_cards ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT merchant, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY merchant;
SELECT c.cardholder_name, ch.credit_score FROM cardholders c JOIN credit_score_history ch ON c.cardholder_id = ch.cardholder_id;
SELECT merchant_name, category FROM merchants WHERE category = 'Retail' ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;
